title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: Federal Laws Specific To Hawai‘i Volcanoes National Park
body: Federal Laws Specific to Hawai‘i Volcanoes National Park          Aug 01, 1916 An Act to establish a national park in the Territory of Hawaii (39 Stst.432) pdf 19KB   Aug 25, 1916 An Excerpt from the Act of August 25, 1916, National Park Organic Act which establishes the National Park Service pdf 11KB   Feb 27, 1920 An Act to authorize the governor of the Territory of Hawaii to acquire privately owned lands and rights of way within the boundaries of Hawaii National Park (41 Stat. 452) pdf 11KB   May 01, 1922 An Act to add a certain tract of land on the island of Hawaii to the Hawaii National Park (42 Stat. 503) pdf 13KB   Apr 11, 1928 An Act to revise the boundary of a portion of Hawaii National Park (45 Stat. 424) pdf 18KB   Apr 18, 1930 An Act to provide for the exercise of sole and exclusive jurisdiction by the United States over the Hawaii National Park (46 Stat. 227) pdf 20KB   Jun 20, 1938 An Act to add certain lands on the island of Hawaii to Hawaii Nationl Park pdf 23KB   Jun 25, 1938 To amend an Act approved Apr 19, 1930 for sole and exclusive jurisdiction pdf 13KB   Apr 21, 1948 An Act to provide that appointments of United States commissioners be made by United States district courts pdf 13KB   Mar 18, 1959 An Act to provide for the admission of the State of Hawaii into the Union pdf 11KB   Sep 13, 1960 An Act to change the designation of that portion of the Hawaii National Park on the island of Hawaii to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park (75 Stat. 577) pdf 13KB   Nov 10, 1978 Boundary Changes - Wilderness pdf 16KB   Nov 13, 2000 An Act to eliminate restrictions on the acquisition of certain Land contiguous to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park pdf 17KB
